docs.title: Jellyfin Enhanced
docs.text: The essential enhancement suite for Jellyfin, bundling advanced features and customizations into one convenient plugin.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Advanced Keyboard Shortcuts - Comprehensive hotkeys for navigation and playback control
  • Smart Bookmarks - Save and jump to specific timestamps with visual timeline markers
  • Custom Pause Screen - Beautiful overlay with media info when paused
  • Jellyseerr Integration - Search, request, and discover media directly from Jellyfin
  • Quality Tags - See 4K, HDR, Atmos at a glance on posters
  • Genre Tags - Identify genres instantly with themed icons
  • Rating Tags - TMDB and Rotten Tomatoes ratings on posters
  • Multi-language Support - Available in 12+ languages

docs.title: Quick Start
docs.text:
1. Go to Dashboard → Plugins → Catalog
  2. Add repository: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/n00bcodr/jellyfin-plugins/main/10.11/manifest.json
  3. Install Jellyfin Enhanced
  4. Restart Jellyfin server

See Installation Guide for detailed instructions.

docs.title: Can I customize the keyboard shortcuts?
docs.text: Yes! Open the Jellyfin Enhanced panel by clicking the menu item or pressing ?, then go to the Shortcuts tab. Click on any key to set a custom shortcut.

docs.title: Does this work on mobile apps?
docs.text: Yes, the plugin works on the official Jellyfin Android and iOS apps, as well as desktop and web UIs.

docs.title: Does this work on Android TV?
docs.text: No, the plugin does not work on Android TV or other native TV apps. It only functions on clients that use Jellyfin's embedded web UI.

docs.title: Plugin not appearing after installation?
docs.text:
1. Verify it's installed in Dashboard → Plugins → My Plugins
  2. Check scheduled tasks: Dashboard → Scheduled Tasks → "Jellyfin Enhanced Startup"
  3. Clear browser cache (Ctrl+F5)
  4. Restart Jellyfin server

docs.title: I see permission denied errors
docs.text: This is common with Docker installations. Install the file-transformation plugin to resolve this.

docs.title: Auto-skip not working?
docs.text: Auto-skip requires the Intro Skipper plugin to be installed and intro segments to be detected for your media.

docs.title: Jellyseerr integration not connecting?
docs.text:
1. Verify your Jellyseerr URL and API key in plugin settings
  2. Ensure "Enable Jellyfin Sign-In" is enabled in Jellyseerr settings
  3. Import your Jellyfin users into Jellyseerr
  4. Click "Test Connection" in plugin settings

docs.title: Tags not showing on posters?
docs.text:
1. Ensure the feature is enabled in settings or Jellyfin Enhanced Panel
  2. Clear browser cache (Ctrl+F5)
  3. Verify media has the required metadata

docs.title: How do I gather logs?
docs.text:
Browser Console: 1. Press F12 to open developer tools 2. Go to Console tab 3. Filter by "Jellyfin Enhanced" 4. Look for errors

Server Logs: 1. Go to Dashboard → Logs 2. Look for "JellyfinEnhanced" entries

docs.title: Scripts not loading?
docs.text:
1. Clear browser cache completely
  2. Do a hard refresh: Ctrl+F5 (Windows/Linux) or Cmd+Shift+R (Mac)
  3. Check browser console for errors
  4. Verify scheduled task ran successfully

docs.title: Jellyseerr Integration
docs.text:
Search, request, and discover media directly from Jellyfin's search interface.

Setup: 1. Go to plugin settings → Jellyseerr tab 2. Enter your Jellyseerr URL and API key 3. Enable search integration

docs.title: Prerequisites
docs.text:
• Jellyfin server version 10.11.x
  • Admin access to your Jellyfin server

docs.title: Standard Installation
docs.text:
1. In Jellyfin, go to Dashboard → Plugins → Catalog → ⚙️
  2. Click ➕ and add repository
  3. Set Repository URL based on your Jellyfin version:
Jellyfin 10.11 
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/n00bcodr/jellyfin-plugins/main/10.11/manifest.json
  1. Click Save
  2. Go to Catalog tab, find Jellyfin Enhanced, click Install
  3. Restart your Jellyfin server

docs.title: Verify Installation
docs.text:
After restart:

  1. Refresh your browser (or press Ctrl+F5)
  2. Look for Jellyfin Enhanced menu item in the sidebar
  3. Click it or press ? to open the settings panel

docs.title: Docker Installation
docs.text:
Docker Permission Issues

Docker installations may need the file-transformation plugin to avoid permission errors.

docs.title: Install file-transformation plugin
docs.text:
1. In Catalog tab, search for "file-transformation"
  2. Install the File Transformation plugin
  3. Restart your server
  4. Then install Jellyfin Enhanced normally

docs.title: Plugin Not Appearing
docs.text:
1. Check Dashboard → Plugins → My Plugins to verify installation
  2. Check Dashboard → Scheduled Tasks → Run "Jellyfin Enhanced Startup"
  3. Clear browser cache (Ctrl+F5)
  4. Restart Jellyfin server

docs.title: Permission Errors
docs.text:
If you see permission denied errors:

Windows: - Grant "NETWORK SERVICE" read/write permissions to Jellyfin folder

Linux: 

sudo chown -R jellyfin:jellyfin /usr/lib/jellyfin/

Docker: - Install file-transformation plugin (recommended) - Or map the index.html file manually
